characterDescription:
Elthebar is a Stormwarden who resided in the Shattered Plains and indicated that a highstorm was unlikely on a given day, despite that he'd been wrong before.
Elthebar had promised that the weather on the Shattered Plains would not slip into winter, but his promises were always filled with caveats.

characterDetails.Character: Elthebar takes issue with scribes; to Teshav he says that her writing is pretty, but that she must give more heed to science.
characterDetails.Notes: To Pattern, Shallan says that she never liked Elthebar. That he acts nice around Dalinar, but that he's really quite mean.
